text: (Yusupha) mhanale, tumhala je bhojana dile jate, te tumacyajavala pohacanyapurvica mi tumhala tyaca khulasa sangene, he sarva kahi tya jnanamule ahe je mala majhya palanakartyane sikavile ahe. Mi tya lokanca dina (dharma) sodala ahe, je allahavara imana rakhata nahi ani akhiratalahi man'ya karita nahi
